Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with significant delays from the area of Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with significant delays from the area of Howard.

We are moving and crews are working to restore normal service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
